subject: Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Juventus opened a 40,200-seat stadium outside Turin with a 1-1 draw in a friendly against Notts County, the English club that provided its first white-and-black jerseys in 1903.
snippet: Juventus opened a 40,200-seat stadium outside Turin with a 1-1 draw in a friendly against Notts County, the English club that provided its first white-and-black jerseys in 1903.
